page.title: 17Population.
page.content:
Chart showing spread of Population Less than Between Between Between Over 1 YEAR. 1-5Yrs. 5-10yrs.10-20yrs 20.
8fams. 10fams. 13fams 15fams. 14fm (fams.)refers to families.
Due to the rural aspect of the area,the next question we felt would be relevant was:{Do you work in or out {of the area?.}As we thought the majority of workers did work out of the area.Of the 60 forms,35 had people working out of the area.Eleven worked in the area,10 were retired and 4 were out of work. Because of the lack of a good bus service in the area,we thought it would be interesting to enquire how the people got to work.Of the 50 workers,31 went by car,10 on foot,8 by M'cycle and 1 by van.
